title: The News Boys
medium: oil on canvas mounted on academy board
credit_line: Gift of Haugh and Keenan Galleries
provenance_text: Henry Miner, Pittsburgh, by 1860; Mrs. Joseph Phillips, East End, PA, 1879; Mr. and Mrs. John H. Ricketson, Jr., Pittsburgh, by 1932; Mrs. John H. Ricketson III, Pittsburgh, by 1955; Haugh and Keenan Galleries, Pittsburgh, by 1955; gift to Museum, 1956.

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
